meanings.sent1: The table was the woodiest piece of furniture in the room.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with the woodiest trees I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his wooden chair was feeling jealous of the woodiest table.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had the woodiest tone, resonating like a sturdy oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh pine was the woodiest scent in the air, reminding me of a peaceful forest.

meanings.definition: Covered with or full of trees or shrubs.
meanings.sent1: The woodiest area of the park provided the perfect shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The garden was the woodiest place in the neighborhood, attracting many birds.
meanings.sent3: The overgrown bushes made the backyard look like the woodiest jungle.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was the woodiest tangle, resembling a dense forest.
meanings.sent5: The woodiest part of the trail was a magical tunnel of greenery, blocking out the sun.

meanings.definition: Having a strong or robust nature.
meanings.sent1: His woodiest determination helped him overcome all obstacles.
meanings.sent2: The team showed their woodiest spirit during the final match.
meanings.sent3: She faced the challenge with her woodiest attitude, ready to conquer it.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood with the woodiest resilience against the storm.
meanings.sent5: His woodiest handshake conveyed a sense of trust and reliability.
